item.description:
Please note that Mass Audubon has said there is still room on the Sugaring tour, but the breakfast is full.

If you are paid, but can't attend for whatever reason next weekend, please post here. There may be a member willing to take your place. Thanks! 

 

We will start with 9AM Sugaring off tour. Learn how to identify a sugar maple, observe tapping and sap collection methods, and watch the sap being boiled down in the sugarhouse.

 

At 10:30 we will have pancake breakfast.  After breakfast we will continue with photo shoot. The sanctuary has 10 miles of trails that consist of wetlands,fields, and forest. 

 

You must call Mass Audubon at 978-887-9264  9am-4Pm and make reservation for tour and breakfest. Cost is $12.50. As of today there were 10-15 spots open. Call Today! Please indicate on your rsvp if you paid.             www.massaudobon.org
item.why: 9Am Sugaring OFF Tour 1 hour long. 1030AM Pancake breakfast Can take photos on tour.
item.name: Flapjack Fling breakfast/Maple Sugaring photo shoot
